resources.name: bees
resources.desc: Bees have unexpected uses in spells of life and generation.

skills.desc: Beekeeping has many surprising uses in the magic of life and creation.

encounters.desc: Young women of the village weave ribbons around a central pole. The commoners never suspect the magic weaves created.
From spring spices to dwarven garnets, all manner of luxuries are bartered at the fair.
Across the world tinkers wagons creak along the roads, to trade their wares at the festival.

locales.name: tree of fate
locales.desc: At the center of the world the great idrasil stretches to the heavens.
locales.flavor: A single seed once fell from Ygggrasil.

furniture.desc: A small hive for keeping bees.

dungeons.name: sunny fields of stone
dungeons.desc: The fields you remember in former days are now overrun with fearsome beasts.
dungeons.flavor: every budding mage needs to start somewhere.
